fields.content: Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk
fields.excerpt: Singer-songwriter Ben Westwood performs as a duo with multi-instrumentalist Scott Doane, playing a range of acoustic originals and covers that blend folk, blues, rock and soul.
fields.title: Ben Westwood

fields.content:
Marky started teaching himself piano at the age of 14. After moving to London, Marky was soon a regular on the circuit working as resident pianist in pubs and bars, entertaining audiences with his wide repertoire of covers and catchy originals.

Playing in his unique style of energetic piano based Rock 'n' Roll, Marky doesn't use backing tracks: it's all live and he's happy to take requests. After all, with a song list covering 7 decades there's a pretty good chance he'll know the song you love!

Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk
All events are in pre-booked ‘bubbles’
fields.excerpt: Marky started teaching himself piano at the age of 14. After moving to London, Marky was soon a regular on the circuit working as resident pianist in pubs and bars, entertaining audiences with his wide repertoire of covers and catchy originals.
fields.title: Marky Dawson

fields.content:
A fabulously festive Christmas concert, performed by West End professionals Natalie Roberts and Viv Berry.

Book your two hour bubble, ticket includes free mince pie or gingerbread man! 

December 24th. Doors at 2.00pm and 4.00pm  £10/£7 cons

Please email info@printersplayhouse.co.uk to book your table bubble.
fields.excerpt: A fabulously festive Christmas concert, performed by West End professionals Natalie Roberts and Viv Berry.
fields.title: ‘It’s Beginning to look a lot like Christmas’

fields.content:
Join Helen Ward - Jackson and Natalie Roberts for a night at the musicals, as they celebrate the end of 2020!!!

Featuring songs from all your favourite West End and Broadway leading ladies.

Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk

All events are in pre-booked ‘bubbles’

fields.excerpt: Musicians, poets, storytellers, comedians are all welcome! Basically anyone who needs a mic to express their art.
fields.title: Open Stage

fields.content:
Join big Al Arcane and the Nightrider for a COVID Safe performance!

Big Al's musical project is to blend traditional Rhythm 'n Blues with modern styling to create an inclusion that celebrates cultural variety. He enjoys roots music; blues, boogie and the jazz developed from these influences.

7.45pm start, tickets £5

Book your tickets in bubbles by emailing us at: info@printersplayhouse.co.uk

All events are in pre-booked ‘bubbles’
